thread.title: David Frum: Trump’s Tweet About the ‘Enemy’ Press Seems Like ‘Incitement to Vigilante Violence’
thread.title_full: David Frum: Trump’s Tweet About the ‘Enemy’ Press Seems Like ‘Incitement to Vigilante Violence’

author: Josh Feldman
title: David Frum: Trump’s Tweet About the ‘Enemy’ Press Seems Like ‘Incitement to Vigilante Violence’
text:
David Frum: Trump’s Tweet About the ‘Enemy’ Press Seems Like ‘Incitement to Vigilante Violence’ by Josh Feldman | 7:09   
On MSNBC earlier tonight, The Atlantic ‘s David Frum expressed some serious concern about the implications of President Trump ‘s tweet categorizing some press outlets as the “enemy.” 
Greta Van Susteren asked him, “Was it a good week or a bad week for the president?” 
Frum responded, “It’s a bad week for the country.” 
In talking about the week he brought up Trump’s tweet and said it “looks a lot like an incitement to vigilante violence.” 
Frum expressed the same thought on Twitter earlier: Hard to read this twice posted tweet other than as incitement to vigilante violence https://t.co/NfCQeyyCts 
— David Frum (@davidfrum) February 17, 2017 
Watch above, via MSNBC.
